about_the_game:
Leaper is a captivating pixelated arcade side-scrolling platformer that offers an engaging and thrilling gaming experience. In this delightful game, players take on the role of a character whose main objective is to navigate through various levels filled with challenges and collect apples along the way.

The gameplay centers around the jumping mechanic, requiring precise timing and quick reflexes. Players must carefully time their jumps to avoid cunningly placed traps and hazardous obstacles that stand in their path. The traps add an element of excitement and strategic thinking, making each level a unique and enjoyable challenge.

Game Features

  • Side-scrolling Platformer: Leaper is a classic side-scrolling platformer, where players control the character's horizontal movement while navigating through a series of levels.
  • Precise Jumping Mechanics: The game's core challenge lies in mastering the jumping mechanics. Players must time their jumps accurately to avoid traps and obstacles effectively.
  • Collectible Apples: A primary objective in Leaper is to collect scattered apples throughout the levels. Players must strive to gather all the apples to progress to the next stage.
  • Challenging Traps and Obstacles: Each level is filled with cleverly placed traps and obstacles that demand quick thinking and agile movements to overcome.
  • Kid-Friendly Visuals: Leaper features colorful and charming pixel graphics that create a visually appealing and child-friendly gaming environment. The vibrant visuals enhance the overall gaming experience for players of all ages.

name: Leaper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1030
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Leaper is a pixelated side-scrolling platformer where you collect apples, avoid traps, and progress through colorful levels. Test your reaction skills in this kid-friendly arcade game.
